intersection_toomanycats: Used as error message when the number of categories is limited and is too large.
intersection_noresults: Used when the query returns no result.
intersection_noincludecats: Used as error message when the number of categories is 0 (and namespace filtering is disabled).
intersection_pcerror: Error message given if the servers are overloaded because too many DPL queries are being executed at the same time. Similar to {{msg-mw|view-pool-error}}
intersection-category: Name of [[mw:Help:Tracking categories|tracking category]] to list pages that use the DynamicPageList feature
intersection-category-desc: Description on [[Special:TrackingCategories]] for the {{msg-mw|intersection-category}} tracking category.
